name: generator-steeplejack
description: Yeoman generator for creating Steeplejack apps

scripts.test: npm run -s test:lint && npm run -s test:app
scripts.test:app: npm run -s test:app:expressCompile && npm run -s test:app:expressNoCompile && npm run -s test:app:restifyCompile && npm run -s test:app:restifyNoCompile
scripts.test:app:expressCompile: echo 'expressCompile' && node ./test/app expressCompile && npm run test:kill
scripts.test:app:expressNoCompile: echo 'expressNoCompile' && node ./test/app expressNoCompile && npm run test:kill
scripts.test:app:restifyCompile: echo 'restifyCompile' && node ./test/app restifyCompile && npm run test:kill
scripts.test:app:restifyNoCompile: echo 'restifyNoCompile' && node ./test/app restifyNoCompile && npm run test:kill

author: Simon Emms <simon@simonemms.com>
